trans-unit.source: Changes the color space of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.
For XAML usage information, see [ColorConvertedBitmap Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/colorconvertedbitmap-markup-extension.md).
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
Property changes can only occur during object initialization.

Call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> to signal that initialization has begun and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> to signal that initialization has completed.
After initialization, property changes are ignored.

<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> objects created using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%29> constructor are automatically initialized, and property changes are ignored.
A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> is never cached.
XAML Text Usage
See Remarks
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"></xref> class.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.

To initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"></xref> class by using the specified values.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
After initialization, property changes are ignored.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> that is converted.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> of the source bitmap.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> of the converted bitmap.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref> of the converted bitmap.
Signals the start of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"></xref> initialization.
Property initialization must be done between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
After the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> has been initialized, property changes are ignored.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"></xref> is currently being initialized.
<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit"></xref> has already been called.
-or-
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"></xref> has already been initialized.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true.`
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true`.
Gets or sets a value that identifies the color profile, as defined by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> class, of the converted bitmap.

When you make property changes to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>, the changes must be done within a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> block.
XAML Text Usage
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.DestinationColorContext"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref> of the converted bitmap.

When you make property changes to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>, the changes must be done within a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> block.
XAML Text Usage
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat"></xref> dependency property.
Signals the end of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"></xref> initialization.
Property initialization must be done between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
After the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> has been initialized, property changes are ignored.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.Source"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.SourceColorContext"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.DestinationColorContext"></xref> property is `null`.
-or-

The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit"></xref> method is called without first calling <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that identifies the source bitmap that is converted.

When you make property changes to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>, the changes must be done within a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> block.
XAML Text Usage
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
A value that identifies the source bitmap that is converted.
Gets or sets a value that identifies the color profile of the source bitmap.

When you make property changes to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>, the changes must be done within a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> block.
XAML Text Usage
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.SourceColorContext"></xref> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.SourceColorContext%2A> dependency property.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.Source"></xref> dependency property.
